sn48.42:4.2: Atha kho uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn48.42:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn48.42:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn48.42:5.1: “Pañcimāni, bho gotama, indriyāni nānāvisayāni nānāgocarāni, na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhonti.
sn48.42:5.4: Imesaṃ nu kho, bho gotama, pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ nānāvisayānaṃ nānāgocarānaṃ na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhontānaṃ kiṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ, ko ca nesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotī”ti?
sn48.42:6.1: “Pañcimāni, brāhmaṇa, indriyāni nānāvisayāni nānāgocarāni na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhonti.
sn48.42:6.4: Imesaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ nānāvisayānaṃ nānāgocarānaṃ na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhontānaṃ mano paṭisaraṇaṃ, manova nesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotī”ti.
sn48.42:7.8: “Accayāsi, brāhmaṇa, pañhaṃ, nāsakkhi pañhassa pariyantaṃ gahetuṃ.
sn48.42:7.9: Nibbānogadhañhi, brāhmaṇa, brahmacariyaṃ vussati nibbānaparāyaṇaṃ nibbānapariyosānan”ti.
sn48.42:8.1: Atha kho uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn48.42:9.1: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkante uṇṇābhe brāhmaṇe bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn48.42:9.2: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, kūṭāgāre vā kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ vā pācīnavātapānā sūriye uggacchante vātapānena rasmi pavisitvā kvāssa patiṭṭhitā”ti?
sn48.42:9.4: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, uṇṇābhassa brāhmaṇassa tathāgate saddhā niviṭṭhā mūlajātā patiṭṭhitā daḷhā asaṃhāriyā samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṃ.
sn48.42:9.5: Imamhi ce, bhikkhave, samaye uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo kālaṃ kareyya, natthi taṃ saṃyojanaṃ yena saṃyojanena saṃyutto uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo puna imaṃ lokaṃ āgaccheyyā”ti.
